A TAF is a Terminal Aerodrome Forecast. It is issued 4 times a day; every 6 hours; generally at 0000, 0600, 1200 and 1800Z and may be amended as necessary. Each is valid for the succeeding 24-30 hours. The forecast is for an area within 5 statute miles of the airport.

(Aeronautical Information Manual 7-1-31)
